title: Ep.31: NFL Draft Edition, Biggest Risers, Players Who Might Fall, Round One Picks 1-32, and More!
description: In this episode we draft all 32 first round picks for each team that has an available pick. This is our most recent mock draft and our second revision. The first round of the draft starts on April 28th and we will keep track of our final mocks compared to what actually happens using a point system we created. The winner gets a case of cider! Tune in to see who your team will draft!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
